name: Tiefling
description: Tieflings are derived from human bloodlines touched by the Lower Planes, bearing an infernal, abyssal, or chthonic legacy.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Otherworldly Presence
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. It uses the same spellcasting ability as your Fiendish Legacy.
